title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8148.15 - Town of Liberty
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8148.15 - Town of Liberty

State Regulations
(a) TH 122
between Route 17 and CR 176, a distance of 0.10+- mile; provided, however, that
TH 122 between Route 17 and CR 176 is designated as an access highway for use
by tandem- trailer combinations of not more than 96 inches in width only, and
is not hereby designated as an access highway for any other types of
vehicles. (b) CR 176 between TH 122
and a point 1.52+- miles east, a distance of 1.52+- miles in the Town of

Liberty. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8148.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
